import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Container, Image, Col, Row, InputGroup, Nav, Tab, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import '../styles/UserProfile.css' const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { user: state.requestUserLoginReducer.user, } } class UserProfile extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { country: '' } } componentDidMount(){ console.log(this.props.user[0].id); fetch('http://localhost:3000//profile/:userid', { method: 'post', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, }).then(response => response.json()) .then(user => { if (user[0].id) { dispatch(requestSuceed(user)); } else if (user[0].error) dispatch(requestFailed(user[0].error)); }).catch(err => dispatch(requestFailed(err))) } render() { const user = this.props.user[0]; console.log(user); return (
Personal Information Address

First name Last name Email Username Date of birth Gender
Address Information
Address Address 2 City Country Zip
Edit
); } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(UserProfile);
